title: Cox Plate 2019: Brody Jenner DJ set struggles to pull in a crowd
text:
Brody Jenner struggled to pull in a big crowd during his highly-anticipated DJ set at the Cox Plate horse race in Melbourne on Saturday.

As the 36-year-old reality star, who is the older half-brother of Kylie and Kendall Jenner, took to the stage just a handful of racegoers stayed to watch.

In footage shared to Instagram by the Moonee Valley Racing Club, around 50 people - out of the thousands of attendees at the Cox Plate - showed up to see Brody.

Where is everybody? American reality star Brody Jenner struggled to pull in a big crowd during his highly-anticipated DJ set at the Cox Plate horse race in Melbourne on Saturday

In one clip, Brody takes a sip of his drink as the camera pans to the small gathering. Many bemused people are seen walking past but fail to stop.

Brody later jumps down to the small crowd and encourages the racegoers to do a 'shoey', which is an Australian party tradition involving drinking beer from a shoe.

Getting in the spirit of things, Brody then drinks a 'shoey' himself on stage.

Disappointing turn-out! As the 36-year-old half-brother of Kylie and Kendall Jenner took to the stage, just a handful of racegoers stayed to watch

Getting involved: In footage shared to Instagram by the Moonee Valley Racing Club, around 50 people - out of the thousands of attendees at the Cox Plate - showed up to see Brody

Prior to the event, Brody told the Herald Sun: 'I'm always excited to come back to Melbourne, it's always a great time when I come.

'I heard the Cox Plate is a different experience than the Melbourne Cup and I can't wait to experience it.'

In addition to appearing at the races, Brody is currently in the middle of an Australian nightclub tour.

Australian tradition! Brody later did a 'shoey' on stage by drinking beer from a sneaker

It's over! In August, Brody made headlines after splitting from his wife, Kaitlynn Carter (left)

In August, Brody made headlines after splitting from his wife, Kaitlynn Carter.

Kaitlynn went on to have a brief fling with Miley Cyrus, who had recently separated from her husband, Liam Hemsworth.

Brody is now dating 22-year-old Playboy model Josie Canseco.
description: Brody Jenner struggled to pull in a big crowd during his highly-anticipated DJ set at the Cox Plate horse race  in Melbourne on Saturday.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
